subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City gave its title rivals renewed hope Sunday by losing for the second time in England’s Premier League this season, allowing a goal with four seconds left in stoppage time in a 1-0 loss at Sunderland.
snippet: Manchester City gave its title rivals renewed hope Sunday by losing for the second time in England’s Premier League this season, allowing a goal with four seconds left in stoppage time in a 1-0 loss at Sunderland.
